eventName: So Long, Adele: Home Away From Home
storyInfo: Facing a Little Black Sheep that's seemingly lost, Eyjafjalla decides to help it find its way home. Following the workers' guidance, Ceylon manages to track down Pelipper, and the lost little sheep finds who it's looking for.

attributes.content: I still don't get it. Why would a lady like you choose to spend your days in a hole like this? Aren't you afraid of the Infected?
attributes.name: Bewildered Youth

attributes.content: Are the Infected not but normal people saddled with misfortune?
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: Just like this child of mine, yet unborn. Maybe she'll become Infected herself, or remain a lucky one who just makes friends with them.
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: Either way, I wish for her to live in a city full of love and goodness.
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: If continuing to mine here will harm the environment, shouldn't we stop?
attributes.name: Bewildered Youth

attributes.content: For now, this city can only rely on nature's bounty. Even so, our descendants will definitely carve out a home with their own hands.
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: I hope then that you and I, and all of them—that all of us will find our own place in Siesta.
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: The elderly unhindered by age, the sickly unburdened by despair, that is the Siesta of my dreams... That is the Siesta I wish for my child to see.
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: Could that really ever happen?
attributes.name: Bewildered Youth

attributes.content: Well, let's start with the mines!
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: Little Black Sheep, why are you all alone? Do you know where the rest went?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Also, you keep eating these old signposts and addresses on letters. Is it because you're lost?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: You... can you understand me...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The fluffy creature remains silent as it sniffs about, picking the next signpost to be devoured.
Did you get lost when Siesta moved?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Or is your home on the undeveloped plate instead of the mines?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The fluffy creature paws the ground urgently as Adele stands, silently looking at it.
Where does it want to go?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Hesitantly, it approaches Adele, pressing its head to Adele's chest as if listening to her heartbeat.
Ba-dump, ba-dump, ba-dump...
Not this sound, not this sound.
The fluffy creature lowers its head and continues following the path ahead.
Are you looking for your home, or your friends and family?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Do you know where to find them?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The fluffy creature turns its head, staring inquisitively at Adele.
Adele, where are you?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: I need to you help me with some data, can you come to the museum now?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Adele looks at the expectant creature in front of her.
Ah... Professor Keller, I-I... I'm sick today!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I feel dizzy, and I have a headache too. Also my legs hurt... I feel terrible...!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Terrible? Adele, what's wrong?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Do you need to go to the hospital? Do you need my help? Do you have medicine on hand? I... How's your body temperature, are you feverish?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: No, Professor Keller, I'll be fine... I'm at the hospital right now!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: With no reply forthcoming, the fluffy creature stomps the ground impatiently and turns to leave. Adele rushes to keep up with it—
A car speeds by, frantically honking at Adele who's just taken a step forward.
Honk~~ Honk~~!
Ugh, my ears...
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Adele? What are you doing here? Weren't you...?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: P-Professor Keller... I-I...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: (I must have been pushing her too hard, if a girl like Adele feels the need to fake an illness to rest...)
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Adele...
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: If you're feeling overwhelmed, you could take a day off to rest.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Turning its head to confirm that Adele is no longer following, the fluffy creature skips off and leaves the street.
Professor Keller, I want to take some time to relax here...!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: What if I told you that I want to offer you a job with stable pay that isn't detrimental to your health? I'll even provide special lodgings for you.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Don't worry, I can guarantee the working environment and conditions, as well as medical services. You just need to pay a portion of the rent to the government...
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Heh, even you can't go on, can you? I don't know what those government people are on about, but I know this much at least. These things take a lot of money, not a mere hundred or thousand gold certificates.
attributes.name: Discouraged Worker

attributes.content: With this money, I might be able to buy a decently comfortable bed, eat a nice meal, and it may even save my life if it comes to it. But it can't build what you're promising.
attributes.name: Discouraged Worker

attributes.content: ...I can do it.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Doctor, if you were to say you'd build us a cheaper hospital. Frankly, I'd be really grateful, and I'd actually believe you could do it. But saying that you'll provide jobs, homes and healthcare...
attributes.name: Dispirited Worker

attributes.content: Just look around you. It's been so long and this place is still undeveloped.
attributes.name: Dispirited Worker

attributes.content: I beg you to place your trust in me. I'll stand by my words.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: So, if there really was a place like that, would you be willing to move there? Would you be happy with it?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Frustrated, Ceylon feels her heart hammering in her chest, its beat pounding in her ears.
What was that? Sorry, I missed what you said...
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I said, even Mr. Pelipper, our boss back at the old mines, only got us so far with all of his wealth and power.
attributes.name: Discouraged Worker

attributes.content: Doctor, we don't know you, and you don't owe us anything. We'll be grateful even if you just come to treat us once in a while.
attributes.name: Discouraged Worker

attributes.content: The fluffy creature trots ahead, Adele following closely behind while Keller walks apologetically beside her.
After hesitating several times, she slowly opens her mouth.
Did you know, Adele, Siesta's layout remained the same even after it moved... There's a coffee shop down this street.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Adele continues hurrying along the path without stopping, as if chasing after something.
...Katia, Magna and I met at that coffee shop.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Adele stops moving and squints into the distance, trying to spot the shop.
Is it... that one over there? I can't see the sign clearly, Mock...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Mockingbird Café.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Keller sighs in relief and changes her tone.
I was just a student back then, knowing little about the world besides what I read in books.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Katia and Magna burned... Two young flames, with eyes even brighter than obsidian.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: My parents... What were they like back then?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Brilliant... Interesting, and very attractive.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Of course, some people thought they were weird. Not professors or scholars, they were more like two vagrants chasing after volcanoes.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: They liked bright clothes and accessories, believing that they granted courage. They would sometimes camp beside lava flows just to feel the movement.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Eh? Pfft, I thought they'd have banned that kind of thing!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: They did. They banned me from doing it. Because I once followed them to collect some liquid from a sulfuric acid pool and accidentally stepped in a pit of boiling water.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Katia managed to drag me out. I hadn't even felt the pain yet but my shoes had already split like garlic cloves...
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: I gave Magna quite a fright. Even though it was an accident, she kept trailing after me from then on, fearing that I'd just fall into another hole somewhere when she wasn't looking.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: The fluffy creature seems to realize something, turning its head to look Keller up and down.
As if worrying for her, it butts her ankles and even tries to eat her shoe heels, so that she can walk more comfortably.
Just like Mutti worrying about me getting hurt.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Magna? You couldn't compare her care for me to what she felt for you.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Sorry... I was lost in thought.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: After you were born, I came to visit you occasionally. I thought you looked so much like your parents...
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: You doing the same work as them now feels like... It feels like a part of them has never left, that they still remain here.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: ...If only they were still here.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Following the salty scent of the sea carried on the breeze, the fluffy creature begins scampering away. The towering cranes of the undeveloped plate peak over the horizon as Keller hurries forward and turns her head.
Adele!
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Magna once said we are like tiny little ants standing on this vast landscape, talking big about how we plan to conquer it.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Look at the both of us now, Adele. Two little ants standing here, facing this building dozens of times bigger than us.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: I used to think I would be just like before, feeling infinitesimally small and amounting to nothing.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: (Whisper) But it's only now do I realize some things are too hard to say aloud.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Professor Keller, what do you—?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Nothing...
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Adele, how can I tell you...?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: You can still see a little bit of the old Siesta from here. Mount Siesta is over that side.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Who knows when it will really erupt?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The creature carrying a miner's lamp slows down and stares blankly in the direction of Old Siesta.
The waves wash over the distant gravel, the surface sparkling like brilliant gems.
Once it erupts, once the museum is ready, my work will finally be done.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I've taken up so much of your time, Adele...
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: It's alright, Professor Keller. There's no one else who can tell me about my parents anyway.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I'm really happy to know these things...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Keller stands and brushes the dirt off herself.
Are you leaving now?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Maybe I need to buy some courage, like in that dream you mentioned.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Goodbye, Adele. See you tomorrow.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Rest well and don't tire yourself.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Adele glances at the creature still staring blankly at old Siesta.
Bye, Professor Keller!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The fluffy creature stands motionless on the beach.
Did you find the place you were looking for?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Adele sits down next to the motionless creature.
Let me guess... You're a miner who wanted to return here?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The creature shakes its head from side to side, pulling its gaze from the ocean to Adele opposite itself. Its clear eyes look up at her.
It chews on an old signpost as it steadily paws at the ground.
Ba-dump, ba-dump, ba-dump...
Slowly, it turns to leave the area.
No no no! I'm just an old man who likes collecting pretty rocks. I can't do what you want or help you at all!
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Mr. Brown, those workers said that your father owned the mine, and that they all worked for you for many years. Even after the move, you still helped make their lives better, under the table—
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Yes, that's right. My father's mine made them into Infected, while I decorate my house with rocks they risked their lives to dig out.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Am I helping them? As if. They're barely surviving as it is, at most they're not jobless.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: So you admit it?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: No! My god, calm down, woman! Don't you go breaking my collection!
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Well then, let's talk about your collection.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Before Siesta moved, this obsidian was an extremely precious ore. However, only obsidian that was pure enough or which reflected the colors of the rainbow could fetch a good price. I'm sure you're aware.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Ceylon bends down and drags out two boxes of ore from behind the cabinet.
So, what are these?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Why would a collector like you have crude, impure obsidian like this? Exactly like the obsidian the workers squirreled away?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Hmph, what would you know? All obsidian is precious to me!
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Then why did you stop the workers from mining? What stopped you from working them to death, instead arranging gainful employment for them as drivers, ticket sellers, and security guards?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Those are lifelines they found for themselves!
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Oh? So you just helped them along while indirectly earning money off them?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Yes, that's absolutely right!
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Why do you refuse to admit it?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: They're not living well right now. The obsidian that they mined propped up Siesta, but now—
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Pelipper heaves a great sigh and sinks back onto his seat.
Missy, do you think it's that easy changing the policies of an entire city?
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Look at them now, look at me.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: You've heard them call me 'Mr. Brown.' Brown Mines, the entire company is in my hands, but even I can't build a factory for them to make a living in.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: The government will harass me, my peers will plot against me, and that's not even considering Columbia and Victoria. Just keeping to ourselves here in Siesta isn't that bad.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: You do know... Columbia has Infected pay sky-high insurance premiums and then sends them to mine in the wastelands?
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: I know that!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: That's why I came to you for help! You have far more knowledge and experience with the situation than me.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: If Columbia uses the Infected question to attack us, we can just build our own place for Infected first. If your peers begin plotting, we can try to negotiate with them.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: There must be something we can do. You can't just hide away in this hot spring hotel forever. What would that accomplish?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Getting increasingly agitated, Ceylon feels as if her heart is about to leap out of her chest.
This is the best leverage for Siesta to negotiate with Columbia right now...
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: But, you seem...
attributes.name: Bewildered Youth

attributes.content: Yes, I'm five months along now. The doctor says it's a girl.
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: Congratulations! But, then you...?
attributes.name: Bewildered Youth

attributes.content: Siesta needs to develop, it can't wait any longer. That's why I want to help these workers, I want to teach them...
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: I want them to learn how to avoid danger, how to observe the environment, how best to protect themselves after a Catastrophe. They have only gotten by with experience so far, but I can give them knowledge.
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: Will that work? The mine is huge and there's so many illiterate people who only know how to earn money. Father says things like that are very common, and that there are always many workers so we don't need to care too much...
attributes.name: Bewildered Youth

attributes.content: That's different.
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: Tom cares, Hank cares, Bill cares, many workers will care.
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: I also want to push a new policy regarding the current state of these workers. These workers who've contracted Oripathy due to Obsidian mining should be taken better care of.
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: But Father tells me that the government will never have time for this. They only want to earn more and more money to develop Siesta.
attributes.name: Bewildered Youth

attributes.content: Then I will bring their attention here. I can't just sit in an office all day with the knowledge that they're getting hurt and sick. What would that do?
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: The lady gently caresses her pregnant belly, feeling the little heartbeat of the life growing peacefully inside.
Ba-dump, ba-dump, ba-dump...
Miss... May I have your name?
attributes.name: Bewildered Youth

attributes.content: Young lady, what's your name?
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: ...Who knows, I might see you again in the future. If you really manage to do something, I'll lend you my help.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Barbara Doykos.
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: You can call me Barbara.
attributes.name: Gentle Scholar

attributes.content: Ceylon. Ceylon Doykos.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Alright, I'll remember.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Wait, Doykos?
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: We're near Fashion Street already, where are you actually going?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Little Black Sheep, what does the mining lamp on your back really mean...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The fluffy creature continues forward leisurely, searching and chewing. Sounds pass by its twitching ears, the sound of wind, people, and in the far distance, the rumblings of volcanic activity.
Ba-dump, ba-dump, ba-dump...!
Sounds like sparking thunder resound in its ears, overwhelming the sounds of geologic activity and flowing magma.
Ba-dump...! Ba-dump...! Ba-dump...!
It stops in the middle of the street, blankly looking from side to side before it breaks into a sudden run, sprinting away on all fours.
Wait... Where are you going?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Did you find it? It's here?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Barbara was your mother?
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: —Hold on!
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Wait, this... this...
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Standing on a chair, Pelipper retrieves a delicate box from the top of the cabinet. Behind the glass cover, a large, uncut geode lays there, obsidian crystals sparkling.
No, wait, I should call them over. They were the ones who left me with this... Tom, Hank, and Bill, I need to get them all here...!
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Yes, Barbara was my mother... Mr. Brown, what is this? Who are Tom, Hank, and Bill?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Ceylon Doykos...
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: This is a gift that those workers prepared for your mother, a long time ago. To celebrate your birth and express their gratitude.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: A gift for mother? My mother...?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: In the end, she wasn't able to receive the gift...
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: I'll explain to the old men when they get here. I want them to see me hand this over to you—Your mother...!
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Ba-dump, ba-dump, ba-dump...!
Ba-dump...! Ba-dump...! Ba-dump...!
Little Black Sheep—!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: A fluffy creature steps into the hotel, as if guided by a sound.
Ba-dump...! Ba-dump...! Ba-dump...!
This sound is coming from a lady, her chest heaving from agitation.
The heart is beating. With each beat, it transports blood across all four limbs, it carries nutrition from the mother's body, all the way to the slumbering little infant.
That tiny little heartbeat has grown up.
Ba-dump...! Ba-dump...! Ba-dump...!
The fluffy creature rests its head on Ceylon's chest.
Ceylon doesn't see anything, but she feels a sudden warmth.
It's heavy, as if something has fallen into her lap.
Ceylon?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: ...Eyjafjalla?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Ceylon suddenly feels as if she can see something, something growing heavier in her lap.
A little sheep gradually appears before her—It's head leaning against her chest, as if listening to something.
Ba-dump! Ba-dump! Ceylon's heart is beating violently, making thundering sounds that only she and the little sheep can hear.
She sees the little sheep lightly nose the geode, before bumping her forehead with its own.
This is...?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: ...The Little Black Sheep... She's no longer lost.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: She seems to have found what she's looking for.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Lost...?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Argh—Don't drop that geode—If it shatters I'll be done for—
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: The little sheep nimbly leaps from Ceylon's lap and disappears into the mist.
Eyjafjalla... what was that?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: You saw it, didn't you?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It's a farewell, I guess.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: A farewell... and a reunion!
attributes.name: Adele
